channel.title: Need Help with PI base
channel.description: Hello, I have started using PI [Project Insanity] for the first time. And since I have been wired with Delta, I am not really having a great time using this base, but I have been astonished from what I have discovered from it so far. Anyways, @topic. I have been trying to make a specific weapon safe on death, even if you are skulled and don't have protect item on. But I have not discovered how to do so yet, any help? :\

item.title: Need Help with PI base
item.dc:creator: @Skorge Skorge
item.description:
@Skorge wrote:

I Vain I:

Hint: ItemAssistant.

Thank you, I searched and found an “item’s kept on death” statement.
I will get coding :P.
Thank you for the help.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help with PI base
item.dc:creator: @Skorge Skorge
item.description:
@Skorge wrote:

Hello, I have started using PI [Project Insanity] for the first time. And since I have been wired with Delta, I am not really having a great time using this base, but I have been astonished from what I have discovered from it so far.
Anyways, @topic.
I have been trying to make a specific weapon safe on death, even if you are skulled and don’t have protect item on.
But I have not discovered how to do so yet, any help? :\
